attributes.action: Only allow UK taxpayers to recieve honours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are calling for Lewis Hamilton to recieve a gong in the New Years Honours. 
I believe that only UK tax-payers should be entitled to awards, not people who live abroad to avoid paying UK tax rates. Those who move to Monaco or Switzerland etc. to take advantage of low tax should no longer be eligible for these honours.
